creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: abstract image; white background with multicolored pigments in brushstroke- like lines; scribble drawing surrounded by a box drawing in pencil in upper left quadrant; text in top center in pencil reading 'orange, white, green, ultramarine'; blue drips in URC; thin black line runs vertically in center left
markings: LLC in pencil: AP II/III | LLC impressed in paper: RW
medium: Archival pigment print on Epson Ultra Smooth Fine Art paper
signed: LRC in pencil: R Weingarten | LLC on back in pencil: PALETTE SERIES: DAVID SALLE #1, (WALL STROKES), 2005
title: Palette Series: David Salle #1, (Wall Strokes)
